1.0.0.name: connect20/XMLShopConnector
1.0.0.description: We introduce you an electronic 'stock synchronisation' module for Magento Commerce, called XML Shop Connector. With the XML Shop Connector it is now possible to load XML / CSV files from your supplier in real time in your Magento store.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
